code: var useCreateDate=function useCreateDate(){var dateObj=new Date();var monthName=dateObj.toLocaleString('en-US',{month:'short'});var date="".concat(monthName," ").concat(dateObj.getDate(),", ").concat(dateObj.getFullYear()," [").concat(dateObj.getHours(),".").concat(dateObj.getMinutes(),"]");return date;};export default useCreateDate;
